SELECT T1.user_proper_num AS user_proper_num, T1.user_name AS user_name, T3.court_name AS court_name, T4.trial_fcltt_clasifi_code AS trial_fcltt_clasifi_code, T2.aplicn_dtls_sts AS aplicn_dtls_sts, T2.aplcn_dtls_proper_num AS aplcn_dtls_proper_num, T2.aplicn_dtls_date AS aplicn_dtls_date FROM TB_001 T1 INNER JOIN TB_005 T2 ON T1.user_proper_num = T2.user_proper_num INNER JOIN TB_011 T3 ON T2.court_proper1 = T3.court_name INNER JOIN TB_010 T4 ON T2.trial_fcltt_proper_num = T4.trial_fcltt_proper_num
where T2.aplicn_dtls_sts in ('신청완료', '심사중', '서류반려', '평가완료', '합격')
and T1.${cri.searchField} like concat('%', #{cri.searchContent}, '%')

and T3.${cri.searchField} like concat('%', #{cri.searchContent}, '%')
